item.title: Damaged telecom utility cabinet, 14th April
item.description:
This damaged utilities cabinet was damaged around May/June last year. Red barriers were placed around it but nothing since. It was reported on fix my street 8/10/24 and again on 5/3/25 as nothing was done. An email was received from highways on 5/3/25 stating that it was the first they had heard of the issue and they would raise a section 81 so that it could be enforced with the utility company. The issue remains unchanged almost 6 weeks later. This is now 10 or 11 months after the cabinet was originally damaged. Replies to the highways email create an auto response advising to report issues on fix my street - hopefully it will be third time lucky

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-4, Barlow Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
